img.title: Alert
img.a: ALL SCHOOL BUILDING ARE CLOSED FOR THE 2019-2020 SCHOOL YEAR

div.p: However, remote learning is ongoing. Please visit our dedicated page that houses all information about COVID-19: http://www.natickps.org/news/covid19_updates.

link.script: renderEmergencyMsg("ALL SCHOOL BUILDING ARE CLOSED FOR THE 2019-2020 SCHOOL YEAR", "2020/03/12", "2020/06/17");

span.style: white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri; font-size: 32px; color: rgb(192, 0, 0);
font-size: 20px; letter-spacing: 0.3px; font-family: "MS Sans Serif"; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
span.em: Our purpose is to educate all students we serve to high levels through high-quality instruction.

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.3px; font-family: "MS Sans Serif"; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
span.br: Our vision is to provide all students with personalized learning environments that promote deeper authentic learning experiences.
